title: Region defined by vertical line and radical f

content.question: Let R be the region enclosed by the graph of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>y</mi> <mo>=</mo> <msqrt> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>−</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> </msqrt> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWG5bGaeyypa0ZaaOaaa8aabaWdbiaadIhacqGHsislcaaIXaaa leqaaaaa@3AF9@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>, the vertical line x = 10, and the x-axis. (a) Find the area of R.

frqParts.text: Let R be the region enclosed by the graph of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>y</mi> <mo>=</mo> <msqrt> <mrow> <mi>x</mi> <mo>−</mo> <mn>1</mn> </mrow> </msqrt> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qacaWG5bGaeyypa0ZaaOaaa8aabaWdbiaadIhacqGHsislcaaIXaaa leqaaaaa@3AF9@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>, the vertical line x = 10, and the x-axis. (a) Find the area of R.
(b) Find the volume of the solid generated when R is revolved about the horizontal line y = 3.
(c) Find the volume of the solid generated when R is revolved about the vertical line x = 10.

topic.text: 8.4: Finding the Area Between Curves Expressed as Functions of x

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
